                       java.lang.String firstId,
                       GetRepliesCallback callback)
        getReplies - List the message replies for a parent message
        Parameters:
        {type} - parent_id The message parent id, ie the top of the thread
        {type} - options Pagination params, ie {limit:10, idlte: 10}

      • sendReaction

        public void sendReaction(java.lang.String messageId,
                         ReactionRequest reactionRequest,
                         MessageCallback callback)
        sendReaction - Send a reaction about a message
        Parameters:
        {string} - messageID the message id
        {object} - reaction the reaction object for instance {type: 'love'}
        {string} - user_id the id of the user (used only for server side request) default null

      • deleteReaction

        public void deleteReaction(java.lang.String messageId,
                           java.lang.String reactionType,
                           MessageCallback callback)
        deleteReaction - Delete a reaction by user and type
        Parameters:
        {string} - messageID the id of the message from which te remove the reaction
        {string} - reactionType the type of reaction that should be removed
        {string} - user_id the id of the user (used only for server side request) default null

        public void addDevice(java.lang.String deviceId,

        addDevice - Adds a push device for a user.
        Parameters:
        {string} - id the device id
        {string} - push_provider the push provider (apn or firebase)
        {string} - [userID] the user id (defaults to current user)

      • removeDevice

        public void removeDevice(java.lang.String deviceId,
                         DeviceCallback callback)
        removeDevice - Removes the device with the given id. Clientside users can only delete their own devices
        Parameters:
        {string} - id The device id
        {string} - [userID] The user id. Only specify this for serverside requests
